title: How did Benazir Bhutto really die? - Quora

response.answer_text: She died from a head wound she sustained when she smashed against the sunroof's lever as she tried to shelter inside the car. The lever struck near her right ear and fractured her skull. She could have survived the blast if she had not stood up through the sunroof of her vehicle to acknowledge her supporters. She could have survived had she been sitting. An unsolved murder mystery Benazir Bhutto 'did not die from shots or blast'
